title: The Life and Death of My Lord Gilles de Rais
description: A recreation of the Bluebeard story which follows a French Army captain, formerly in service to Saint Joan of Arc, executed in Brittany in 1440. The list of his crimes include witchcraft, heresy, sacrilege, sorcery, the evocations of demons and the practice of unnatural crime against children, ending with their murder for his delight.
author: Robert Nye
